alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 5:19PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Rabun, southeastern Macon, southwestern Transylvania, southeastern Jackson, northwestern Pickens and northern Oconee Counties through 600 PM EST... At 519 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northeast of Clayton, or near Sky Valley, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Highlands, Mountain City, Rosman, Tiger, Dillard, Sky Valley, Cashiers, Lake Toxaway and Lake Jocassee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for northeastern Georgia...western North Carolina...and Upstate South Carolina.
